main event: A bright light was observed in the sky traveling rapidly and then disappearing from sight on 15 August 1959.
interesting points: The observation lasted for 10 minutes., The object was reported to be moving very fast., There was no detailed information on the object's location and description available in the report., The object disappeared abruptly., No photographs were confirmed in the report.
sighted object: a bright light in the sky
witness description: No specific witnesses mentioned in the report.
